column6: The Avengers are dead--long live the Avengers! Earth's Mightiest Heroes--Captain America, Thor, Vision, and Iron Man--are living separate lives, not tied to any team--but when a threat from beyond the stars targets our world, fate draws them together once more, alongside Nova, Ms. Marvel, and Miles Morales a.k.a. Spider-Man!
column8: | artist:Mahmud Asrar | artist:Adam Kubert | penciller (cover):Alex Ross | writer:Mark Waid
